feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
